original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū pacchato gacchantā purato gacchantassa dhammaṁ desenti …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū pacchatas gacchantā puratas gacchantassa dhammaṃ desenti pe

original: “Na pacchato gacchanto purato gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṁ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: na pacchatas gacchantaḥ puratas gacchantassa a gilānassa dhammam desessāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Na pacchato gacchantena purato gacchantassa agilānassa dhammo desetabbo.
analyzed: na pacchatas gacchantena puratas gacchantassa a gilānassa dhammaḥ desetabbo

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca pacchato gacchanto purato gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṁ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca pacchatas gacchantaḥ puratas gacchantassa a gilānassa dhammam deseti āpatti dukkaṭassa
